00006 #define STREAM_DURATION   5.0
00007 #define STREAM_FRAME_RATE 25 /* 25 images/s */
00008 #define STREAM_NB_FRAMES  ((int)(STREAM_DURATION * STREAM_FRAME_RATE))
00009 #define STREAM_PIX_FMT PIX_FMT_YUV420P /* default pix_fmt */

00020 AVFrame* CVideoEncoder::AllocPicture(int pix_fmt, int width, int height)
00021 {
00022     AVFrame *picture;
00023     uint8_t *picture_buf;
00024     int size;
00025 
00026     picture = avcodec_alloc_frame();
00027     if (!picture)
00028         return NULL;
00029     size = avpicture_get_size(pix_fmt, width, height);
00030     picture_buf = (uint8_t*)av_malloc(size);
00031     if (!picture_buf) {
00032         av_free(picture);
00033         return NULL;
00034     }
00035     avpicture_fill((AVPicture *)picture, picture_buf,pix_fmt, width, height);
00036     return picture;
00037 }

00039 bool CVideoEncoder::OpenVideo()
00040 {
00041     AVCodec *codec;
00042     AVCodecContext *c;
00043 
00044     c = video_st->codec;
00045     /* find the video encoder */
00046     codec = avcodec_find_encoder(c->codec_id);
00047     if (!codec)
00048     {
00049         cerr << "codec not found" << endl;
00050         return false;
00051     }
00052 
00053     /* open the codec */
00054     if (avcodec_open(c, codec) < 0) {
00055         cerr << "could not open codec" << endl;
00056         return false;
00057     }
00058 
00059     video_outbuf = NULL;
00060     if (!(oc->oformat->flags & AVFMT_RAWPICTURE)) {
00061         video_outbuf_size = 200000;
00062         video_outbuf = (uint8_t*)av_malloc(video_outbuf_size);
00063     }
00064 
00065     /* allocate the encoded raw picture */
00066     picture = AllocPicture(c->pix_fmt, c->width, c->height);
00067     if (!picture) {
00068         cerr << "Could not allocate picture" << endl;
00069         return false;
00070     }
00071 
00072     tmp_picture = NULL;
00073     //if (c->pix_fmt != PIX_FMT_YUV420P) {
00074         tmp_picture = AllocPicture(PIX_FMT_YUV420P, in_w, in_h);
00075         if (!tmp_picture) {
00076             cerr << "Could not allocate temporary picture" << endl;
00077             return false;
00078         }
00079     //}
00080     frame_count = 0;
00081     return true;
00082 }
00083 
00084 AVStream* CVideoEncoder::AddVideoStream(CodecID codec_id)
00085 {
00086     AVCodecContext *c;
00087     AVStream *st;
00088 
00089     st = av_new_stream(oc, 0);
00090     if (!st) {
00091         cerr << "Could not alloc stream" << endl;
00092         return NULL;
00093     }
00094 
00095     c = st->codec;
00096     c->codec_id = codec_id;
00097     c->codec_type = CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO;
00098 
00099     /* put sample parameters */
00100     c->bit_rate = 400000;
00101     /* resolution must be a multiple of two */
00102     c->width = out_w;
00103     c->height = out_h;
00104     /* time base: this is the fundamental unit of time (in seconds) in terms
00105         of which frame timestamps are represented. for fixed-fps content,
00106         timebase should be 1/framerate and timestamp increments should be
00107         identically 1. */
00108     c->time_base.den = 25;
00109     c->time_base.num = 1;
00110     c->gop_size = 12; /* emit one intra frame every twelve frames at most */
00111     c->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_YUV420P;
00112     if (c->codec_id == CODEC_ID_MPEG2VIDEO) {
00113         /* just for testing, we also add B frames */
00114         c->max_b_frames = 2;
00115     }
00116     if (c->codec_id == CODEC_ID_MPEG1VIDEO){
00117         /* Needed to avoid using macroblocks in which some coeffs overflow.
00118             This does not happen with normal video, it just happens here as
00119             the motion of the chroma plane does not match the luma plane. */
00120         c->mb_decision=2;
00121     }
00122     // some formats want stream headers to be separate
00123     if(!strcmp(oc->oformat->name, "mp4") || !strcmp(oc->oformat->name, "mov") || !strcmp(oc->oformat->name, "3gp"))
00124         c->flags |= CODEC_FLAG_GLOBAL_HEADER;
00125     return st;
00126 }

00128 bool CVideoEncoder::Open(const char *name, int width_in, int height_in, int width_out, int height_out)
00129 {
00130     strcpy(fname, name);
00131     in_w = width_in;
00132     in_h = height_in;
00133     out_w = width_out;
00134     out_h = height_out;
00135 
00136     fmt = guess_format(NULL, name, NULL);
00137     if(!fmt)
00138         fmt = guess_format("mpeg", NULL, NULL);
00139 
00140     if(!fmt)
00141     {
00142         cerr << "Could not find suitable output format" << endl;
00143         return false;
00144     }
00145 
00146     oc = av_alloc_format_context();
00147     if(!oc)
00148     {
00149         cerr << "Memory error" << endl;
00150         return false;
00151     }
00152     oc->oformat = fmt;
00153     snprintf(oc->filename, sizeof(oc->filename), "%s", name);
00154     video_st = NULL;
00155     if(fmt->video_codec != CODEC_ID_NONE)
00156         video_st = AddVideoStream(fmt->video_codec);
00157 
00158     if(av_set_parameters(oc, NULL) < 0)
00159     {
00160         cerr << "Invalid output format parameters" << endl;
00161         return false;
00162     }
00163 
00164     if(video_st) OpenVideo();
00165 
00166     if (!(fmt->flags & AVFMT_NOFILE)) {
00167         if (url_fopen(&oc->pb, name, URL_WRONLY) < 0) {
00168             cerr << "Could not open '" << name << "'" << endl;
00169             return false;
00170         }
00171     }
00172 
00173     /* write the stream header, if any */
00174     av_write_header(oc);
00175 
00176     return true;
00177 }

00179 void CVideoEncoder::DumpFormat()
00180 {
00181     dump_format(oc, 0, fname, 1);
00182 }
00183 
00184 void CVideoEncoder::CloseVideo()
00185 {
00186     avcodec_close(video_st->codec);
00187     av_free(picture->data[0]);
00188     av_free(picture);
00189     if (tmp_picture) {
00190         av_free(tmp_picture->data[0]);
00191         av_free(tmp_picture);
00192     }
00193     av_free(video_outbuf);
00194 }
00195 
00196 void CVideoEncoder::Close()
00197 {
00198     if (video_st)
00199         CloseVideo();
00200 
00201     /* write the trailer, if any */
00202     av_write_trailer(oc);
00203 
00204     /* free the streams */
00205     for(int i = 0; i < oc->nb_streams; i++) {
00206         av_freep(&oc->streams[i]->codec);
00207         av_freep(&oc->streams[i]);
00208     }
00209 
00210     if (!(fmt->flags & AVFMT_NOFILE)) {
00211         /* close the output file */
00212         url_fclose(oc->pb);
00213     }
00214 
00215     /* free the stream */
00216     av_free(oc);
00217 }
00218 
00219 bool CVideoEncoder::EncodeFrame(BITMAP *bmp)
00220 {
00221     int out_size, ret;
00222     AVCodecContext *c;
00223 
00224     video_pts = (double)video_st->pts.val * video_st->time_base.num / video_st->time_base.den;
00225     c = video_st->codec;
00226 
00227     //if (frame_count >= STREAM_NB_FRAMES) {
00228         /* no more frame to compress. The codec has a latency of a few
00229         frames if using B frames, so we get the last frames by
00230         passing the same picture again */
00231     //} else {
00232         //if (c->pix_fmt != PIX_FMT_YUV420P) {
00233             /* as we only generate a YUV420P picture, we must convert it
00234                 to the codec pixel format if needed */
00235             if (img_convert_ctx == NULL) {
00236                 img_convert_ctx = sws_getContext(bmp->w, bmp->h, PIX_FMT_RGB32,
00237                                                 c->width, c->height, c->pix_fmt,
00238                                                 sws_flags, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00239                 if (img_convert_ctx == NULL) {
00240                     cerr << "Cannot initialize the conversion context" << endl;
00241                     return false;
00242                 }
00243             }
00244 
00245             tmp_picture->data[0] = (uint8_t*)bmp->line[0];
00246             tmp_picture->linesize[0] = in_w*4;
00247 
00248             //fill_yuv_image(tmp_picture, frame_count, c->width, c->height);
00249             sws_scale(img_convert_ctx, tmp_picture->data, tmp_picture->linesize, 0, c->height, picture->data, picture->linesize);
00250         /*} else {
00251             //fill_yuv_image(picture, frame_count, c->width, c->height);
00252         }*/
00253     //}
00254 
00255     if (oc->oformat->flags & AVFMT_RAWPICTURE) {
00256         /* raw video case. The API will change slightly in the near
00257         futur for that */
00258         AVPacket pkt;
00259         av_init_packet(&pkt);
00260 
00261         pkt.flags |= PKT_FLAG_KEY;
00262         pkt.stream_index= video_st->index;
00263         pkt.data= (uint8_t *)picture;
00264         pkt.size= sizeof(AVPicture);
00265 
00266         ret = av_write_frame(oc, &pkt);
00267     } else {
00268         /* encode the image */
00269         out_size = avcodec_encode_video(c, video_outbuf, video_outbuf_size, picture);
00270         /* if zero size, it means the image was buffered */
00271         if (out_size > 0) {
00272             AVPacket pkt;
00273             av_init_packet(&pkt);
00274 
00275             //if (c->coded_frame->pts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE)
00276                 pkt.pts= av_rescale_q(c->coded_frame->pts, c->time_base, video_st->time_base);
00277             if(c->coded_frame->key_frame)
00278                 pkt.flags |= PKT_FLAG_KEY;
00279             pkt.stream_index= video_st->index;
00280             pkt.data= video_outbuf;
00281             pkt.size= out_size;
00282 
00283             /* write the compressed frame in the media file */
00284             ret = av_write_frame(oc, &pkt);
00285         } else {
00286             ret = 0;
00287         }
00288     }
00289     if (ret != 0) {
00290         cerr << "Error while writing video frame" << endl;
00291         return false;
00292     }
00293     frame_count++;
00294     return true;
00295 }
